locations.title: Crystal Ridge RV Park At Ron Coleman Mining
locations.street: Crystal Ridge RV Park At Ron Coleman Mining 4.6(48)Camping Ground
locations.content: Crystal Ridge RV Park At Ron Coleman Mining may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Camping here and digging crystals, full hookups. Laundry room, showers and restrooms excellent! I found crystals my 1st day, and a small cluster the next, so yes there are treasures to be dug up here! So much fun!!!

Okay, so there aren't rooms, but lots. There's not really service, rather, conveniences. And the location is awesome! The restroom accommodations were fantastic, including showers, in an updated facility. We thoroughly enjoyed our time there, and walked away with some great crystals and some very fond memories.

My husband grand daughter  and myself spent a few days at the campground while Crystal digging in a few spots near there. We all had a great time. The camp area was very clean.camp hosts were very friendly . The bath and shower rooms were ‚Ä¶

The campsite is beautiful and wooded. Bathrooms are nice and clean. It started to rain so i tarped the tent. Went mining the next day had a great time with my sister and her family.I had the best time staying here and mining. I got ‚Ä¶

Me, my wife and son got there Friday night and were immediately greeted my MsTamara. As we were getting ready to shower in our Rv the hot water heater would not work. Figured it was needing a fuse. I walked over and spoke to lance and ‚Ä¶

Camp hosts were very friendly and welcoming!  The restroom and shower facilities were kept really clean, which is huge!  Beautiful, shaded campground within short walking distance to the Coleman Crystal Mine.  Also a short drive to gas, groceries, and dining options.  This was our first stay here, but it definitely won't be our last.
